Thalai leh thangthar te'n awlsam zawka rimawi an zir theih nan

MZ CHORD FEATURES

1

A bulṭhut

MZ CHORD zirna bungrua leh pawimawh dang dah luhna tur siam fel a ni.

2

MZ CHORD APP

Thalaite banphakah, mizo hla ngei zir theihna tur, mobile app duan mek a ni.

3

HLA DIL LEH DAH

MZ CHORD-a awm lo, hla dilna leh dah belhna tur siam a ni ang.

FAQ

Zawhna i nei em?

Q1. Enge MZ CHORD CHU??

Mizo thalai leh thangtharte'n awlsam zawka rimawi tum thiam an zir theih nan, MCHORD hi buatsaih a ni.

Q2. Engtin nge hla kan request theih ang?

Hla la awm lo request duh in nei a nih chuan MOBILE APP-ah luha, 'REQUEST SONG' tab atangin request theih a ni ang.

Q3. Mahniin hla a dah luh theih em?

Mahnia hla dah luh dawn chuan Website-ah in lut anga, HLA DAH BELHNA form atangin dah belh theih a ni ang.

Q4. MZ CHORD hi engtia enkawl nge?

MZ CHORD hi tlawmngaia hun leh tha senga thangthar leh thalaite tana buatsaih a ni a. ADS hmanga mahnia intung ding thei tura buatsaih a ni a. Thawhpui thiam zawkte'n zirlai (material) tha tawk tak an lo duang chhuak theih kan beisei bawk.
